full_description:
Huntkey Frozen 200 CPU Cooler

The Huntkey Frozen 200 CPU Cooler provides a reliable cooling solution for your computer system, ensuring optimal performance even with demanding workloads. With its well-designed construction and premium components, this cooler effectively regulates your CPU's temperature, extending its life and performance. Even when doing labor-intensive tasks, it can function quietly and smoothly thanks to Hydro Bearing technology. By dispersing heat at a speed of 2000±10% RPM and keeping a steady airflow of 25–30 cubic feet per minute (CFM), it effectively eliminates heat. This Huntkey Frozen 200 CPU Cooler With a noise level of 20–25 decibels (dBA), it produces a peaceful computing atmosphere. Your system setup may be easily integrated with ease thanks to the 3-pin power connector. With its copper and aluminum construction, the heatsink optimizes heat conductivity. The fan enhances airflow across the heatsink and is designed for vertical placement, which enhances the cooling effect of the heatsink. Measuring 92(L) x 63(W) x 133(H) mm, it may fit into a variety of computer cases and is suitable for installations in small spaces. This cooler meets a wide range of customer needs with its broad compatibility and adaptability, supporting both AMD and Intel systems.

full_description:
Huntkey Frozen 400 RGB CPU Cooler

The Huntkey Frozen 400 RGB CPU Cooler is a dynamic cooling solution tailored for high-performance computing systems. Featuring customizable RGB lighting, it not only keeps your processor cool but also adds a vibrant aesthetic to your gaming or workstation setup. Operating at 1800 RPM (Rotations Per Minute) ±10%, this cooler ensures efficient heat dissipation, maintaining optimal CPU temperatures during intense gaming or demanding computing tasks. With an airflow rating of 44.31 CFM (Cubic Feet per Minute), it effectively moves air through the heatsink, ensuring consistent cooling performance. Despite its powerful performance, the cooler operates at a moderate noise level of 28 dBA (A-weighted decibels), striking a balance between effective cooling and quiet operation. Its compatibility with both Intel and AMD sockets ensures versatility and ease of installation across a wide range of CPU platforms. Whether you're a gamer seeking peak performance or a professional needing reliable cooling for demanding tasks, the Huntkey Frozen 400 RGB CPU Cooler offers a compelling blend of performance, aesthetics, and compatibility to elevate your computing experience.

Huntkey Frozen 600X Fantasy ARGB CPU Cooler

The Huntkey Frozen 600X Fantasy ARGB CPU Cooler is an advanced option designed to meet the rigorous cooling requirements of gamers and industry experts. It blends outstanding performance with an eye-catching aesthetic. With six nickel-plated heat pipes that efficiently divert heat from the CPU to the fins, this cooler maximizes side heat dissipation for higher thermal efficiency. It not only works well, but it also features ARGB lighting, which you can sync with your motherboard to create an eye-catching rainbow of colors that gives the impression that your PC is highly personalized and bright. The Huntkey Frozen 600X excels in compatibility, supporting a wide range of Intel platforms and boasting an easy-to-install buckle design that makes setup simple and guarantees a secure fit and excellent cooling performance. It is essential to include a PWM quiet fan, which can push 44.31 CFM of air at a noise level of 34 dBA, while maintaining a fan speed of 1800 RPM (±10%). This equilibrium guarantees that the cooler doesn't interfere with your gameplay or produce extra noise while operating, preserving a comfortable computer atmosphere. Its flexibility is highlighted by its compatibility with both AMD and Intel sockets, which makes it a good option for a variety of customer bases. As a result, the Huntkey Frozen 600X Fantasy ARGB CPU Cooler stands out for any PC as more than just an accessory. It promises to improve the system's appearance while simultaneously providing excellent cooling capabilities. Whether you like gaming, creating content, or just want the best for your system, this cooler is made to go above and beyond to make sure that your setup looks great and works like it should.
